movies.title: Satan's Brew
movies.plot: Walter, a German anarchist poet, is short of money after his publisher refuses to give him an advance. He tries various ways of raising money, including shooting one of his mistresses and relying on the life savings of a woman from the country who is fanatically devoted to him. He also has to contend with his long-suffering wife, his fly-obsessed crazy brother, his other mistress and a police murder investigation.
movies.simplePlot: Walter, a German anarchist poet, is short of money after his publisher refuses to give him an advance. He tries various ways of raising money, including shooting one of his mistresses and ...

biography.placeOfBirth: Bergreichenstein, Sudetenland [now Kasperské Hory, Czech Republic]
biography.bio: Kurt Raab was born on July 20, 1941 in Bergreichenstein, Sudetenland. He was an actor and production designer, known for Tenderness of the Wolves (1973), Pourquoi monsieur R. est-il atteint de folie meurtrière? (1970) and Satan's Brew (1976). He died on June 28, 1988 in Hamburg, West Germany.
biography.name: Kurt Raab

biography.bio: Margit Carstensen was born on February 29, 1940 in Kiel, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany. She is known for her work on The Bitter Tears of Petra von Kant (1972), Possession (1981) and Martha (1974).
biography.name: Margit Carstensen

biography.bio: Helen Vita was born on August 7, 1928 in Hohenschwangau, Germany as Helene Elisabeth Reichel. She was an actress and writer, known for Cabaret (1972), Satan's Brew (1976) and Zéro huit quinze (1954). She was married to Walter Baumgartner. She died on February 16, 2001 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Helen Vita

biography.bio: Volker Spengler was born on February 16, 1939 in Bremen, Germany. He is an actor and art director, known for In a Year with 13 Moons (1978), The Marriage of Maria Braun (1979) and Veronika Voss (1982).
biography.name: Volker Spengler

biography.bio: Ingrid Caven was born on August 3, 1938 in Saarbrücken, Germany as Ingrid Schmidt. She is an actress, known for In a Year with 13 Moons (1978), Mother Küsters Goes to Heaven (1975) and Le marchand des quatre saisons (1972). She was previously married to Rainer Werner Fassbinder.
biography.name: Ingrid Caven

biography.bio: Y Sa Lo was born in 1945 in Millstatt am See, Austria. She is an actress, known for A Rose: That's What Life Is All About (1977), Lola, une femme allemande (1981) and Querelle (1982).
biography.name: Y Sa Lo

biography.placeOfBirth: Zielenzig, Brandenburg, Germany [now Sulecin, Lubuskie, Poland]
biography.bio: Widely known for his frequent collaborations with Rainer Werner Fassbinder, a creative partnership which lasted 10 years and produced over 20 films, Ulli Lommel is one of the most consistently creative filmmakers to come from the New German Cinema movement. The son of German comic performer Ludwig Manfred Lommel, Ulli Lommel began his career in show business as a child. His second feature film as a director Tenderness of the Wolves (1973) brought Lommel to New York, where he began working with Andy Warhol at The Factory. The Warhol / Lommel years spawned several features, including Cocaine Cowboys (1979) and Blank Generation (1980), both of which were directed by Lommel and feature Warhol in an acting role. In the summer of 2013 Lommel went for nine months to Brazil, where he wrote a book and also made a film about Campo Bahia, the official camp for the German National Soccer Team. His autobiography, entitled Tenderness of the Wolves, is due out in late 2015.
biography.name: Ulli Lommel

biography.bio: Armin Meier was born in 1943. He was an actor, known for Despair (1978), Fear of Fear (1975) and Satan's Brew (1976). He died in 1978 in Munich, Germany.
biography.name: Armin Meier

biography.bio: Katherina Buchhammer is an actress, known for Satan's Brew (1976), Je veux seulement que vous m'aimiez (1976) and Von der Liebe und den Zwängen: Mutmaßungen über Fassbinders 'Ich will doch nur, daß ihr mich liebt' (2010).
biography.name: Katherina Buchhammer

biography.bio: Vitus Zeplichal was born on June 10, 1947 in Salzburg, Austria. He is an actor and director, known for Je veux seulement que vous m'aimiez (1976), Havoc (1972) and My Father Is Sleeping (2007).
biography.name: Vitus Zeplichal

biography.bio: Brigitte Mira was born on April 20, 1910 in Hamburg, Germany. She was an actress, known for Drei Damen vom Grill (1977), Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974) and The Enigma of Kaspar Hauser (1974). She was married to Frank Guerente, Horst Fabian, Paul Cornelius, Reinhold Tabatt and Peter Schütte. She died on March 8, 2005 in Berlin, Germany.
biography.name: Brigitte Mira

biography.bio: Hannes Kaetner was born on June 25, 1912 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany. He was an actor, known for Lemmi und die Schmöker (1973), The Marriage of Maria Braun (1979) and Almost (1999). He died on October 7, 2002 in Munich.
biography.name: Hannes Kaetner

biography.bio: Peter Chatel was born on December 7, 1943 in Bad Segeberg, Schleswig-Holstein, Germany as Peter Schlätel. He was an actor, known for Fox and His Friends (1975), Martha (1974) and Le marchand des quatre saisons (1972). He died on August 25, 1986 in Hamburg, West Germany.
biography.name: Peter Chatel

biography.bio: Heli Finkenzeller was born on November 17, 1911 in Munich, Germany as Helene Finkenzeller. She was an actress, known for Unser Pauker (1965), Emile et les détectives (1954) and Theorie und Praxis (1962). She was married to Alfred Bittins and Will Dohm. She died on January 14, 1991 in Munich, Bavaria, Germany.
biography.name: Heli Finkenzeller

biography.bio: Marquard Bohm was born on June 27, 1941 in Hamburg, Germany. He was an actor and director, known for Ali: Fear Eats the Soul (1974), Kings of the Road (1976) and Beware of a Holy Whore (1971). He died on February 3, 2006 in Wetter an der Ruhr, North Rhine-Westphalia, Germany.
biography.name: Marquard Bohm

filmingLocations.location: Badenburg, Nymphenburg Palace, Munich, Bavaria, Germany

keywords: talking to oneself in a mirror
urinating into the gas tank of a car
